welcome: Your favorites Animes and Mangas in one place!
welcome_enjoy: Enjoy your favorites Animes from your TV
enjoy_sub: Watch your favorites Animes on your Smart TV, Playstation, Xbox, Tablets, and more in the highest quality possible!
welcome_read: Read your favorite Mangas in the highest quality!
read_sub: All your mangas on your smartphone, tablets and more in the highest quality and fastest translation
question_two: Where can I watch or read?
question_three: What can I watch or read on Bushido?
answer_one: Bushido! is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of anime shows, anime movies, mangas, graphic novels, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.
answer_two: Watch or read anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Including PC, smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.
answer_three: Bushido! has an extensive library of anime shows, anime movies, mangas, graphic novels, Bushido! Originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.
signup_error_username: Username should be 3 characters minimum and 12 maximum
